text:
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto 4,Ontario,Canada
September 12, 1960
Dear Harold,
Apropos of Nusbaum suit - There was never any contract.
Prom the first she knew that the duration of the project
was vague. Mighffold at Xmas, 1959,etc.
Then she knew it was to be American funds. But facts are
of no relevance to such an operator.
She was a poor secretary. Lazy, late, and unreliable.
I felt bad about her getting those two extra months salary
That is, she got twelve months pay for ten months of poor
work and poor service.
At no time was there anything in writing. Please ad^vise.
Cord ially
P.S. There were no witnesses at
any time to any conversation we
had about the job.
